name: Psychopomp for a Dying World
description:
Story

The universe is on its last legs and the remainder of humanity faces the heat death of the universe. to limp along a little further gather around a mysterious wormhole that takes you to some time in the past just before disaster struck. plunder the past for any energy source that can keep the future's generators humming.

Controls:

w/a/s/d or arrows to move

shift to run

f/c/e interact
